title: Kaszek leads $27 million Series B round to strengthen its payment infrastructure
summary: Tapi, a startup offering payment infrastructure, closed a Series B round for US$27 million, led by Latin American fund Kaszek. Endeavor Catalyst and Latitud also participated in the round.
